Reviews.Title: gets it done

Reviews.Content: GReat ip camera here cant say enough about this litte guy if you have doubts dont. came fast and it works what more you want

MJPEG, CMOS 300k Pixel,DC 5V2A. P2P(plug and play).
13 LED, IR distance 33 FT. Lens 3.6 mm; Pan:270°, Tilt: 90°,Speed:5-50°/SY CCD.
Two-way audio, Remote Pan/Tilt rotate, Indoor; Motion detection, email alert, FTP upload.
Wi-Fi/802.11/b/g/n , Free Factory DDNS: xxxx.vipcam.org.
iPhone, 3G phone, Smartphone supported; Multi-language, Firefox, Safari, Google browser.
